headline: Marriott International (NasdaqGS:MAR) Declares US$0.67 Dividend Reflecting Strong Earnings
summary: Marriott International (NasdaqGS:MAR) recently declared a quarterly cash dividend increase to 67 cents per share, highlighting its strong earnings growth and cash generation, which aligns with its reported Q1 growth. The company's stock rose 11% over the past month, mirroring the market's broader upward trend of 8% over the past year and a flat recent week. Alongside an earnings increase and new business expansions, such as the opening of the Udaipur Marriott Hotel and The Vanguard Hotel,...
